course_description: Introduces students to the style of analytic thinking required for research and concepts and procedures used in the conduct of empirical research: sampling, hypothesis testing, Bayesian inference, regression, experiments, instrumental variables, differences indifferences, regression discontinuity.
sections: Class Nbr: 1202, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTWThF 9a-12:30p, Instructor: A. Cuttner, Status: Open
